Welcome to Echo 1.0, Celegance, one the grandest EDM fiesta the country has ever witnessed. Echo 1.0, Celegance brings together every kind of EDM enthusiast that has ever existed be it the professionals, amateurs or the budding artists. Ever imagined jumping to those insane beat drops of your favourite dubstep tune? If so EDM night, Echo 1.0 is the right place for you to go.

With DJ war, Echo 1.0 you have a chance to showcase your talent in front of crowd of thousands and a stellar jury at the colour run. Echo 1.0, in Celegance ’18 will be an event filled with joy, vibrance and energy for which Celegance is known. With Echo 1.0, Celegnace ’18 get ready to witness the magic of electronic and feel your pulse beat.

Who can participate

Students who are registered in any program in an educational institute of India and have a valid identity card can participate in the event.

Rules and Regulation

  • Event consist of 2 rounds
    • Round 1
      • Participant should register himself/herself before 12th march 2018.
      • It includes preliminary screening. Participant has to send an audio clip ofmax. 8 mins of their set to asitmohanty8197@gmail.com on or before 14th march 2018.
    • Round 2
      • Teams should assemble 60 minutes prior to their event happening at the designated venue.
      • Each contestant will be given 20 mins to showcase his or her ability behind the console.
      • Pre-edited/pre-mixed tracks will not be allowed. (No tempo and key correction).
      • Mashups will not be allowed. Acapellas are allowed.
      • No hardware besides what is provided by the organizers to be used.
      • Contestants shall bring their own headphones and CDs.
  • JUDGING CRITERIA
    • Mixing ability
    • Tune curation
    • Creativity shown
    • Original tracks

Coordinators

Asit: +919937978110
Snehasish:+919040501634 Event 3 Description Event 4 Description Event 5 Event 6 Event 7 Event 8 Event 9 Event 10 Muscle Manic Xumberance Rangazzi Event 4 Event 5 Event 6 Event 7 Event 8 Event 9 Event 10 body building Music Fine Arts Event 4 Event 5 Event 6 Event 7 Event 8 Event 9 Event 10

Who can participate

Students who are registered in any program in an educational institute of India and have a valid identity card can participate in the event.

General Guidelines

STUDENTS WILL REGISTER TO SHOW THEIR MUSCLES ON THE EVE OF CELEGANCE WITH A NOMINAL REGISTRATION FEE.

  • ROUND 1

    FROM ALL THE REGISTERED STUDENTS RANDOM GROUP OF 3 WILL BE MADE AND THEY HAVE TO SHOW THERE MUSCLE AND SHAPES. THE BEST OF THE 3 WILL BE QUALIFIED FOR THE NEXT ROUND

  • ROUND 2

    IN THIS ROUND THE SELECTED STUDENTS WILL BE GIVEN A COMPULSORY SET OF POSSES AND WILL BE MARKED ACCORDING TO THAT AND SOME WILL BE

    ELIMINATED.
  • ROUND 3

    IN THIS ROUND THERE WILL BE MUSICAL POSE DONE BY THE SELECTED STUDENTS AND WINNER WILL BE DECIDED ACCORDINGLY.

    FINALLY ALL THE PARTICIPANTS WILL DO MUSICAL POSE FOR MORAL BOOST.

A ramp show of a kind that showcases the talent of an individual of how he/she is able to style and adapt to the changes of emerging fashion world.

Rules and Regulations

Who can participate

Students who are registered in any program in an educational institute of India and have a valid identity card can participate in the event.

General Guidelines

  • This contest is open only for bonafide students of C V Raman College of Engineering.
  • All contestants must possess a valid college ID card which must be presented at the time of registration.
  • The registration form comprises two parts

Are you interested in playing with colours? If yes, now is the chance. Get a partner and show your talent here. You’ll get an opportunity to colour your partner and win the prize. “PLAY HOLI WITH CHEHRE PE RANGOLI”.

Rules and Regulation

Who can participate

Students who are registered in any program in an educational institute of India and have a valid identity card can participate in the event.

General guidelines

  • Round 1

    In the first round the participants will be given a topic and they have to paint on the chart paper with any two colours. The team with best painting will be selected for the next round.

  • Round 2

    In this round a member of the team has to paint the face of the partner on any topic of their wish. The best painted face will be qualified for the next round.

  • Round 3

    This will be the final round, in this the team will be given a topic according to which the painter of the team have to paint the face of the partner and have to describe the painting. The best painted and described face will be declared as winner.

STUDENT Coordinators

Rituparna Sitha-7978534185
Swarnima-7751876664
